items.sentence: You can find more information on our website.
You can stay here for a while if you want to.
Were you the one who told Tom not to do that?
What I want right now is a hot cup of coffee.
I already told you not to smoke in your room.
I am staying at the hotel for the time being.
I always get up at 6 o\'clock in the morning.
I always walk to school if it\'s not raining.
I just want you to know I don\'t believe you.
I knew that Tom wouldn\'t be able to help us.
Why didn\'t you tell me Tom wasn\'t Canadian?
I\'ll take care of the dog while you are out.
I\'ll take my passport with me, just in case.
I\'ll talk to you at a more appropriate time.
I\'ll tell Tom the truth when the time comes.
I\'ll tell you everything from the beginning.
I\'ll tell you exactly what I need you to do.
I imagine that Tom will eventually fire Mary.
Somebody told me that I shouldn\'t trust you.
All you have to do is give him a little help.
